function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of strategic sensitivity and awareness of emergent trends in the environment","Impact":"Failure to detect regular service provision gaps caused by sudden changes in environments","Mitigation":"Regular environmental scanning and exploration processes","Technologies":"Environmental sensing technologies","People":"Top management","Owner":"Top management"},{"Description":"Lack of leadership unity and commitment to difficult decisions in times of turbulence","Impact":"Inability to effectively allocate resources and generate business models","Mitigation":"Establishing a culture of commitment and collaboration within the leadership team","Technologies":"Collaboration and decision-making platforms","People":"Top team, leadership team","Owner":"Top team, leadership team"},{"Description":"Inadequate resource fluidity and reconfiguring capabilities","Impact":"Failure to execute the service strategy and adapt to changing environments","Mitigation":"Implement resource re-allocations effectively through effective decision-making processes","Technologies":"Resource management and decision support systems","People":"Leadership team, decision-makers","Owner":"Leadership team, decision-makers"}]}
